member.name: T:Rms.Platform.Aspects.ResponseFormatAttribute
member.summary: Aspect for setting appropriate response format

member.name: M:Rms.Platform.Aspects.ResponseFormatAttribute.OnEntry(PostSharp.Aspects.MethodExecutionArgs)
member.summary: Method executed before the body of methods to which this aspect is applied.
member.param: Event arguments specifying which method is being executed, which are its arguments, and how should the execution continue after the execution of .

member.name: T:Rms.Platform.Aspects.MethodTraceAttribute
member.summary: Method Trace Aspect. Log Begin/End to functions

member.name: M:Rms.Platform.Aspects.MethodTraceAttribute.OnEntry(PostSharp.Aspects.MethodExecutionArgs)
member.summary: Method executed before the body of methods to which this aspect is applied.
member.param: Event arguments specifying which method is being executed, which are its arguments, and how should the execution continue after the execution of .

member.name: M:Rms.Platform.Aspects.MethodTraceAttribute.IsProperty(PostSharp.Aspects.MethodExecutionArgs)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified args is property.
member.returns: true if the specified args is property; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Rms.Platform.Aspects.MethodTraceAttribute.OnExit(PostSharp.Aspects.MethodExecutionArgs)
member.summary: Method executed after the body of methods to which this aspect is applied, even when the method exists with an exception (this method is invoked from the finally block).
member.param: Event arguments specifying which method is being executed and which are its arguments.
